member.name: DXCoreAdapterPreference
member.summary: Defines constants that specify DXCore adapter preferences to be used as list-sorting criteria. You can sort a DXCore adapter list by passing an array of DXCoreAdapterPreference to IDXCoreAdapterList.Sort.

member.name: DXCoreAdapterPreference.Hardware
member.summary: Specifies a preference for hardware adapters (as opposed to software adapters).

member.name: DXCoreAdapterPreference.MinimumPower
member.summary: Specifies a preference for the minimum-powered GPU (such as an integrated graphics processor, or iGPU).

member.name: DXCoreAdapterPreference.HighPerformance
member.summary: Specifies a preference for the highest-performance GPU, such as an external graphics processor (xGPU), if available, or discrete graphics processor (dGPU) if available.
